text: Slobodan Čendić (28 August 1938 – 19 September 2023) was a football manager. He was among others the manager of FC Schalke 04, 1. FC Saarbrücken, Alemannia Aachen, and Hannover 96. ==Other websites== * * Category:1938 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Serbian football managers Category:FC Schalke 04 managers Category:Alemannia Aachen managers Category:FC Augsburg managers Category:SV Waldhof Mannheim managers Category:SC Preußen Münster managers Category:SV Darmstadt 98 managers
title: Slobodan Čendić
